name: The Unfortunate Tale of Mr. Bones
name_original: The Unfortunate Tale of Mr. Bones
description:
You feel a powerful presence reach out to you in the endless void of the afterlife. If offers you a chance at life again in exchange for payment. Will you accept?
The Unfortunate Tale of Mr. Bones is a topdown action game where you must collect gold in order to pay the wizard that revived you to keep you alive. Place buildings and buy upgrades to collect money faster to keep up with the ever increasing payments. How long will you survive?

Controls:

WASD - Movement | 1,2,3,4 - Select/Deselect buildings | LMB - Place Buildings | RMB- Deselect buildings | Space- Buy Upgrades | ESC - Pause

You will fire bones automatically when you are outside the shop. 

A game by: MiltonNH25, Choco, and Xander Ton
